item.title: Casting Chris Evans In A New MCU Role Now RDJ Is Set To Return As Doctor Doom: 10 Marvel Characters He'd Be Perfect For
item.description: Robert Downey Jr.'s return to the Marvel Cinematic Universe as Doctor Doom opens the door for Chris Evans to return as all sorts of characters.

item.title: 10 Characters Wasted By The Dark Knight Trilogy
item.description: The Dark Knight Trilogy featured a swathe of compelling characters. However, some were unduly sidelined or became lost in the epic narratives.

item.title: The Sad Reality About The Back To The Future Franchise Is Why There Should Never Be A Reboot
item.description: One sad reality about the Back to the Future franchise and its brilliant time-travel formula reveals the real reason why it should never get a reboot.
